attributes.action: Make our public transport great again!
attributes.additional_details:
I travel to Central London every day using South West Trains. The trains are always totally packed in peak time, the underground and the buses are the same. People are standing on each others feet. Also, there are a lot of delays, I am late from work at least once a week.
This has to stop!
attributes.background:
Our public transport is inefficient and overcrowded but really expensive as well.
We want the government to push companies to improve public transport. Bigger trains, bigger buses and underground, less delays! Also, in exchange who earns more would have to pay more for  the tickets.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
